GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Application Date
APP_DATE.instruction:
Enter the date of form submission in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '25-01-2024'

CUST_ID.title: Customer ID
CUST_ID.instruction:
If you already have a Customer ID, enter it here. Otherwise, leave blank.
Example: '10001234'

CKYC_NO.title: CKYC Number
CKYC_NO.instruction:
Enter your 14-digit CKYC number if available.
Example: '10002000300040'

APPLICANT_NAME.title: Applicant Name
APPLICANT_NAME.instruction:
Enter your Title (Mr/Ms), First, Middle, and Last Name exactly as per your Identity Proof.
Example: 'MR. RAHUL KUMAR SINGH'

PERSONAL_DETAILS.title: Personal Details (DOB, Gender, Marital Status)
PERSONAL_DETAILS.instruction: Enter Date of Birth (DD-MM-YYYY), tick Gender, and tick Marital Status.

BIRTH_DETAILS.title: Place & Country of Birth
BIRTH_DETAILS.instruction:
Enter the City and Country where you were born.
Example: 'MUMBAI, INDIA'

TAX_RESIDENCY.title: Tax Residency (FATCA)
TAX_RESIDENCY.instruction: Fill this ONLY if you are a tax resident of a country other than India. Enter Country and Tax ID Number (TIN).
rejections: Tax resident of foreign country but TIN missing

PARENT_SPOUSE_DETAILS.title: Parents / Spouse Name
PARENT_SPOUSE_DETAILS.instruction:
Enter Father's Name (Mandatory if no PAN). Enter Mother's Name and Spouse Name (if applicable).
Example: 'RAMESH SINGH'
rejections: Father's name missing (when PAN is not provided)

ID_PROOF_DETAILS.title: Identity Proof Details (PAN & Aadhaar)
ID_PROOF_DETAILS.instruction:
Enter your PAN (10 chars) and Aadhaar (Last 4 digits).
Example: PAN 'ABCDE1234F', Aadhaar 'XXXX XXXX 1234'
rejections: PAN missing and Form 60 not attached

PERMANENT_ADDRESS.title: Permanent Address (As per OVD)
PERMANENT_ADDRESS.instruction:
Enter address exactly as on your proof document (OVD). Include Line 1, Line 2, City, State, and Pin Code.
Example: 'FLAT 101, MG ROAD, PUNE, 411001'

CURRENT_ADDRESS.title: Current / Mailing Address
CURRENT_ADDRESS.instruction: If different from Permanent Address, enter new address and attach 'Deemed OVD' (e.g., Utility Bill). If same, tick 'Same as Above'.
rejections: Address different but proof not attached

CONTACT_INFO.title: Contact Information
CONTACT_INFO.instruction:
Enter your Mobile Number and Email ID for alerts.
Example: '9876543210', 'rahul@email.com'

OCCUPATION_INCOME.title: Occupation & Income
OCCUPATION_INCOME.instruction: Tick Occupation (e.g., Salaried, Self-Employed) and Gross Annual Income range.

PEP_STATUS.title: Politically Exposed Person (PEP)
PEP_STATUS.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if you are a PEP (e.g., Senior Politician) or related to one. Tick 'No' otherwise.

JOINT_APPLICANT_SECTION.title: Joint Applicant Details
JOINT_APPLICANT_SECTION.instruction: If opening a joint FD, fill the Second Applicant's Name, DOB, and ID details in this section.

DEPOSIT_TYPE_SELECT.title: Deposit Type (Regular / Green)
DEPOSIT_TYPE_SELECT.instruction:
Tick ONE box: 'Regular Deposit' OR 'Green Deposit'.
(Note: Green Deposits are for eco-friendly financing).

FD_DETAILS.title: Fixed Deposit Details
FD_DETAILS.instruction:
Enter Amount, Tenure, and Interest Payout Mode.
Example: Amount '1,00,000', Tenure '1 Year 6 Months', Interest 'Quarterly Payout'

FUNDING_MODE.title: Funding Mode
FUNDING_MODE.instruction:
Tick how you are paying: 'Cheque' or 'NEFT/RTGS'. Enter Cheque No/Date.
Example: Cheque No '001234'

MATURITY_INSTRUCTION.title: Maturity Instruction
MATURITY_INSTRUCTION.instruction:
Tick what to do at maturity: 'Renew' (Principal+Interest) OR 'Payout' (Do not renew).
(Green/Tax Saver FDs are 'Payout' only).
rejections: Renew selected for Tax Saver/Green FD

NOMINATION_OPT.title: Nomination Selection
NOMINATION_OPT.instruction: Tick 'Yes' to add a nominee (Recommended). Tick 'No' to decline.

NOMINEE_DETAILS.title: Nominee Details
NOMINEE_DETAILS.instruction:
If Yes, enter Nominee Name, Relationship, and DOB.
Example: 'RITA SINGH, SPOUSE, 12-05-1985'
rejections: Nominee name missing when Yes selected

NOMINEE_GUARDIAN.title: Nominee Guardian (If Minor)
NOMINEE_GUARDIAN.instruction: If Nominee is <18 years, enter Guardian Name and Address.
rejections: Nominee is minor but Guardian missing

SIGNATURES.title: Signatures & Photos
SIGNATURES.instruction: Paste recent photos of all applicants. Sign ACROSS the photo and in the box below.

BANK_USE.title: Bank Use Section
BANK_USE.instruction: Branch codes, product codes, certifications, and KYC verification are to be completed by bank officials only.

DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.title: Supporting Documents
DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.instruction: PAN/Form 60, photo identity proof, address proof, income proof, and business proof (where applicable) must be submitted. Requirements may vary by scheme.
